name: Imp 3d Sudoku
description:
This is my first game of my One Game A Month challenge.

I decided to do this to challenge myself and learn more about the game engine I'm using and I really would love to hear your opinion on this game so I can improve it!

Please feel free to contribute with anything to improve this game and I sincerely hope you have fun with it like my girlfriend had when we were testing the game! :-)

Requirements:

Any android device (minimum version 3.0)

Notes:

This game is a prototype so I still haven't included sound FX / BG music.

Suggestions of style are welcome!
